mortar.api.tetris

Interface Job

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TetrisJob

    public interface Job

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobEnvironment getEnvironment()
      Get the job environment (defaults to async)
      String getID()
      Get the ID for this task
      JobIgnoreCondition getIgnoreCondition()
      Get the condition which the job scheduler is allowed to cancel your job from executing.

      Get the minimum delay before this job can be executed.

      • getMinimumDelay

        int getMinimumDelay()
        Get the minimum delay before this job can be executed. This is essentially a delay for the task, however it is not exact. If the delay is set to 5 ticks, the task will be executed after 5-? ticks. But never below 5 ticks.
        Returns:
        the minimum delay in ticks.

      • getID

        String getID()
        Get the ID for this task
        Returns:
        the task id.

      • getUrgency

        JobUrgency getUrgency()
        Get the urgency for this job.
        Returns:
        the urgency

      • setMinimumDelay

        void setMinimumDelay(int minimumDelay)
        the minimum delay before this job can be executed. This is essentially a delay for the task, however it is not exact. If the delay is set to 5 ticks, the task will be executed after 5-? ticks. But never below 5 ticks.
        Parameters:
        minimumDelay - the delay in ticks.

      • setUrgency

        void setUrgency(JobUrgency urgency)
        Set the urgency for this job. It is usually best to keep it at normal
        Parameters:
        urgency - the urgency

      • getIgnoreCondition

        JobIgnoreCondition getIgnoreCondition()
        Get the condition which the job scheduler is allowed to cancel your job from executing.
        Returns:
        the ignore condition

      • setIgnoreCondition

        void setIgnoreCondition(JobIgnoreCondition ignoreCondition)
        Set the condition which the job scheduler is allowed to cancel your job from executing.
        Parameters:
        ignoreCondition - the ignore condition.
